A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointing < shakes head >\, sure it's flashy\, and has a semblance of a Star Wars movie < my 11 year old liked the action >.  It's missing the mark on sooo many key story-lines\, someone wanted to boldly take the series to a new group of fans\, leaving the rest of us to rot.  Rian missed the mark where AJ held form.
